name: Lila Doesn't Like Her Anymore - web
name_original: Lila Doesn't Like Her Anymore - web
description:
A very short visual-horror-novel about Coco who visits her future campus, and her guide.

Playtime: approximately something between 3 to 10 minutes

Content warning:

Slight gore

Explicit Language
